roleset.name: hold inside
roleset.note: CONTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'contain' based on survey of sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class contiguous_location-47.8, other framed members are cover. Also comparison with 'hold' (from contain.01-v predicate notes)
CONTAINMENT-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from containment.01-n)

example.name: almost literal
example.text: In addition, the Cray-3 will contain 16 processors -- twice as many as the largest current supercomputer.
example.arg: 16 processors -- twice as many as the largest current supercomputer

roleset.name: restrain, halt the spread of
roleset.note: CONTAIN-V, CONTAINMENT-N, CONTAINED-J NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: contain-v
example.text: [Imperialist America]-1 wants *PRO*-1 to contain China's development.

example.name: containment-n
example.text: Last night's operational briefing indicated an additional 30 percent containment of the fire.

example.name: contained-j
example.text: Republicans are seizing on a claim made by President Obama Thursday that ISIS is 'contained.'
